column3: Latest;Phnom Penh:  Phnom Penh Immigration received two foreigners from local police on December 20
column4: 2018 at 5:30 pm. A Chinese woman on a Chinese blacklist and a Chinese man who has been staying illegally. ------JIN JIE
column6: entered through the border at Bavet and has been staying in Sen Sok without a passport/visa .  ------A representative of Chinese embassy
column7: ​​asked for the Chinese woman to be sent to the General Department of Immigration for deportation
column8: as Chinese police have her on a list.------The man ZHANG HUANHUI
column9: a 31-year-old Chinese was also picked in Phnom Penh’s Sen Sok district. He is thought to have no visa. The police force is questioning and carrying out proceedings. ------https://khmeread.com/posts/37325
